definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3

sentences.english: Because Tantra is a mystical subject, it is nearly impossible to define.
sentences.chinese: 因为坦陀罗是一个神秘的主题，它几乎不可能去定义。

sentences.english: The sweet little Bantam River rose.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的小班坦河水上涨了。

sentences.english: We went back to the elevator and got on.I prayed that Mr.Goldstein would be up.
sentences.chinese: 我们乘电梯去楼上，我祈祷戈尔茨坦先生还没睡。

sentences.english: Goldstein is uncertain about the value of the Olympic Games index to investors.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔茨坦不能肯定奥运会指数会对投资者有多少价值。

sentences.english: Hence, Tantra can be practiced by anyone who is attracted to this path.
sentences.chinese: 从而，坦陀罗可以实践于任何对这条道路感兴趣的人。

sentences.english: The restricted stock units will vest 30 days after his death.
sentences.chinese: 这些限制性股票将在沃瑟斯坦去世30天后授予。

sentences.english: The second part expounds Maritain' s philosophy of moral education in two respects.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分从两个方面阐述了马里坦的道德教育哲学。

sentences.english: She had asked Ser Barristan that question the afternoon the hostages went forth.
sentences.chinese: 送走人质当天下午她曾问过巴利斯坦爵士。

sentences.english: Conclusion The breviscapine injection and piracetam could be combined use directly without dispense abstinence.
sentences.chinese: 花素注射液与吡拉西坦注射液可以直接配伍使用。

sentences.english: Feinstein refused to get in line, was sacked and eventually left the party.
sentences.chinese: 费恩斯坦拒绝妥协，因此被炒了鱿鱼，并最终退党。

sentences.english: This dragon queen who wears her name is a true Targaryen.
sentences.chinese: 这个龙后不负其名，是个真正的坦格利安。

sentences.english: Resident Shabar Khan was trapped in Sultanwas, as the fighting raged on.
sentences.chinese: 当地居民沙巴尔汗当时被困在萨尔坦的激战之中。

sentences.english: Familiarity with Tantra can help a person to enjoy life to the fullest.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉坦陀罗可以帮助一个人去享受到生命的完整性。

sentences.english: The first part concerns the theoretic foundation of Maritain' s philosophy of moral education.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分探讨了马里坦道德教育哲学的理论基础。

sentences.english: That was Mount Tambora, on the island of Sumbawa in Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 发生在印度尼西亚坦松巴哇岛上的坦博拉火山上。

sentences.english: That was Mount Tambora, on the island of Sumbawa in Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 发生在印度尼西亚坦松巴哇岛上的坦博拉火山上。

definition: woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
